title: NSHSS Spotlight: Pradyumna Saligram | National Society of High School ...
snippet: Pradyumna 'Prady' Saligram is a college freshman studying Computer Science at Stanford University. He is passionate about ML and generative AI and hopes to pursue AI further as a track concentration within his major. He is also considering a co-term where he would receive his bachelor's and master's within five years.
